flawed_nl_solution:
He spends 60/3=<<60/3=20.0>>20.0 minutes warming up
So he spends 60+20.0=<<60+20.0=80.0>>80.0 minutes at the gym per day
That means he spends 80.0*3=<<80.0*3=420.0>>420.0 minutes at the gym
So he spends 420.0/60=<<420.0/60=7.0>>7.0 hours at the gym a week

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240.0, not 420.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
